title: Ashita Ai Kamo Shirenai
alternative_title: Ashita Ai Kamo Shiremasen ; Ashita Ai kamo Shirenai ; Love on the Horizon ; Tomorrow Maybe Love ; [비애] 내일 사랑일지도 몰라 ; あした愛かもしれない ; あした愛かもしれません ; 내일 사랑일지도 몰라 ; 明天可能會愛你
status: Ashita Ai Kamo Shiremasen ; Ashita Ai kamo Shirenai ; Love on the Horizon ; Tomorrow Maybe Love ; [비애] 내일 사랑일지도 몰라 ; あした愛かもしれない ; あした愛かもしれません ; 내일 사랑일지도 몰라 ; 明天可能會愛你
description:
Description :
        Kitagawa Nagi, a college freshman, is in love with his senpai, Yamasaki Yuu, who happens to be both his neighbor and in the same folk song club as him. Since popular Yuu is handsome and nice to everyone, naive country boy Nagi resigned himself to the fact that his love would always be unrequited. During their club's welcoming party, Nagi, being his neighbor, was tasked with bringing Yuu to his apartment. As Nagi tucks him into bed, Yuu grabs hold of him and passes out with Nagi trapped in his embrace. Once morning comes, Nagi sneaks out, careful not to wake Yuu up and keeps that night a secret
